question: Who among the following ladies wrote a historical account during the Mughal period?
explanation: Gulbadan Begum took the challenge and produced a document titled Ahwal Humayun Padshah Jamah Kardom Gulbadan Begum bint Babur Padshah amma Akbar Padshah. It came to be known asÂ Humayun-nama. Gulbadan wrote in simple Persian without the erudite language used by better-known writers.
